overview: Meditation on its immediate surroundings, with a certain documentary character. From his studio on Rue de la Glaciere, in some buildings of imminent demolition for a remodeling of the neighborhood, the author observes the signs of slow agony (debris and objects abandoned in a courtyard) and reflects the problem human rights of the evicted, while we introduces into the activities of artists and artisans who they live there.
title: Le rebut
